overview:
GoIIT.com, a premier online educational portal, has recently revamped to cater quality education to the aspirants preparing for top engineering entrance exams such as IIT JEE 2012 AIEEE, WBJEE , KCET, BITSAT etc. The portal is the one-stop destination to access superb engineering study materials, course chapters, ask & discuss doubts from an elite panel of experts comprising of IIT alumni, top coaching professionals, engineering graduates etc. Free online tests, sample practice papers & more. This online educational portal helps engineering aspirants to win laurels in entrance exam by raising their confidence level and by fostering quality education.

goIIT.com’s intention to provides IIT/AIEEE engineering study material, entrance preparation tips, admission notifications,sample test papers, model papers, previous years test papers, mock tests subject-wise for reputed exams BITS, MHT CET, WBJEE, syllabus, pattern, experts advice, online coaching & solve JEE entrance queries at our education forum.

Founded in 2006, GoIIT.com, a pioneer online education platform in education industry, comprises of IIT alumni, top coaching institutes and engineering graduates. The aim of this initiative is to provide a huge advantage to engineering aspirants by offering a distinctive platform for them. This online platform has given an outstanding contribution to gauge their performance.

image.attribution: GOIIT- An Engineering Entrance Preparation & Online Tests Assessment Center
